evolutionmod:LoyalCompanion.NAME: Loyal Companion
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Randomized Form: gain !M! more Block. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:LoyalWarrior.NAME: Loyal Warrior
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Randomized Form: deal !M! more damage. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:Evolution.NAME: Evolution
evolutionmod:Evolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evolve !M! randomized when drawn and at the end of your turn. NL Retain.

evolutionmod:AggressiveBlow.NAME: Aggressive Blow
evolutionmod:AggressiveBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Centaur, Beast, Harpy trait: gain [E].

evolutionmod:HeavyKick.NAME: Heavy Kick
evolutionmod:HeavyKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Centaur Form: Vigor and Strength affect this card !M! times.

evolutionmod:WindUp.NAME: Wind up
evolutionmod:WindUp.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards NL Adapt this with a Centaur gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Stampede.NAME: Stampede
evolutionmod:Stampede.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Channel a Centaur gene.

evolutionmod:Brambles.NAME: Brambles
evolutionmod:Brambles.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Plant Form: gain !M! Brambles

evolutionmod:TalonStrike.NAME: Talon strike
evolutionmod:TalonStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Harpy Form: draw a card and discard a card.

evolutionmod:TakeOff.NAME: Take Off
evolutionmod:TakeOff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Adapt this with a Harpy gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:PegasusDescent.NAME: Pegasus Descent
evolutionmod:PegasusDescent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each 2 cards in your hand. NL Harpy Form: Channel a Centaur gene.

evolutionmod:Dive.NAME: Dive
evolutionmod:Dive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL Merfolk Form: Refund up to 1 [E].

evolutionmod:Drown.NAME: Drown
evolutionmod:Drown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL At the end of this turn the enemy will take your block as damage NL Channel a Merfolk gene

evolutionmod:Broodmother.NAME: Broodmother
evolutionmod:Broodmother.DESCRIPTION: Each turn the next Drone you create will be Upgraded. NL Channel an Insect gene.
evolutionmod:Broodmother.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each turn the next Drone you create will be Upgraded. NL Channel !M! Insect genes.

evolutionmod:Charm.NAME: Charm
evolutionmod:Charm.DESCRIPTION: The enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Succubus Form: gain 1 Potency until your next turn

evolutionmod:StripArmor.NAME: Strip Armor
evolutionmod:StripArmor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Succubus form: Remove all Block from the enemy first. NL Beast Form: add !D! damage.
evolutionmod:StripArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Block from the enemy. NL Succubus Form: apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies and Exhaust.

evolutionmod:Seduce.NAME: Seduce
evolutionmod:Seduce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Give yourself and the enemy Block equal to the unblocked damage. NL Exhaust. NL Succubus Form: you are healed instead.

evolutionmod:FlameStrike.NAME: Flame Strike
evolutionmod:FlameStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lavafolk Form: deal 3 more damage.
evolutionmod:FlameStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Channel a Lavafolk gene.

evolutionmod:ChannelMagic.NAME: Channel magic
evolutionmod:ChannelMagic.DESCRIPTION: Fate 2: if only Skills were discarded gain !M! Potency until your next turn. NL Lymean form: Fate 1 more card. NL Lavafolk form: gain 1 more Potency.
evolutionmod:ChannelMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fate 2: if at least 1 Skill was discarded gain !M! Potency until your next turn. NL Lymean form: Fate 1 more card. NL Lavafolk form: gain 1 more Potency.

evolutionmod:Aphrodisiac.NAME: Aphrodisiac
evolutionmod:Aphrodisiac.DESCRIPTION: Succubus Form: apply !M! Vulnerable NL Lizard Form: trigger Poison.

evolutionmod:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
evolutionmod:Eruption.DESCRIPTION: Lavafolk trait: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and channel !M! Lavafolk genes.

evolutionmod:DrainMana.NAME: Drain Mana
evolutionmod:DrainMana.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards NL Lymean Form: Scry !M! first.

evolutionmod:Purify.NAME: Purify
evolutionmod:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Adapt this with a Lymean gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Aegis.NAME: Aegis
evolutionmod:Aegis.DESCRIPTION: Apply Intangible to EVERYONE. NL When you play an attack Exhaust Aegis from your hand.
evolutionmod:Aegis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply Intangible to EVERYONE. NL When you play an attack Exhaust Aegis from your hand. NL Lymean Form: Gain !B! Block.

evolutionmod:Hatch.NAME: Hatch
evolutionmod:Hatch.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Drones to your hand. NL Insect Form: add one more.
evolutionmod:Hatch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Drones to your hand. NL Channel an Insect gene.

evolutionmod:ClawSlash.NAME: Claw slash
evolutionmod:ClawSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Beast Form: Refund 1.

evolutionmod:Shadowbolt.NAME: Shadowbolt
evolutionmod:Shadowbolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shadow Form: add damage equal to !M! times the Weak of the target.
evolutionmod:Shadowbolt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add damage equal to !M! times the Weak of the target. NL Channel a Shadow gene.

evolutionmod:TheNight.NAME: TheNight
evolutionmod:TheNight.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn do: Shadow Form: add a Shadowbolt to your hand.
evolutionmod:TheNight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn do: Shadow Form: add a Shadowbolt+ to your hand.

evolutionmod:HeightenedSenses.NAME: Heightened senses
evolutionmod:HeightenedSenses.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn this way that are not Attacks. NL Beast Form: NL Harpy Form: gain 3 Rage.
evolutionmod:HeightenedSenses.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn this way that are not Attacks. NL Beast Form: NL Harpy Form: gain 4 Rage.

evolutionmod:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
evolutionmod:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage increased by !M! per [E] spent on attacks. NL Beast form: gain 2 Rage.

evolutionmod:FeatherStorm.NAME: Feather storm
evolutionmod:FeatherStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Startup: shuffle !M! Feathers into your deck.
evolutionmod:FeatherStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn this way that are not Attacks. NL Beast Form: NL Harpy Form: gain 4 Rage.

evolutionmod:Rush.NAME: Rush
evolutionmod:Rush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a random Strike from your deck on the same target. NL Channel a Beast gene.
evolutionmod:Rush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a random Strike from your deck and play a copy on the same target. NL Channel a Beast gene.

evolutionmod:Regenerate.NAME: Antidote
evolutionmod:Regenerate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Fate !M!: Exhaust any Status discarded. NL Lymean form: Channel a Lizard gene.

evolutionmod:PoisonFangs.NAME: Poison Fangs
evolutionmod:PoisonFangs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lizard Form: Apply !M! Poison.

evolutionmod:PoisonSpit.NAME: Poison Spit
evolutionmod:PoisonSpit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage this turn, apply !M! Poison. NL Lizard Form: apply 1 more.
evolutionmod:PoisonSpit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage this turn, apply !M! Poison. NL Channel a Lizard gene.

evolutionmod:DepthsLurker.NAME: Depths Lurker
evolutionmod:DepthsLurker.DESCRIPTION: Discard all 1+ cost cards. NL Gain !B! Block for each card discarded. NL Merfolk Form: channel a Shadow gene.

evolutionmod:CursedTouch.NAME: Cursed Touch
evolutionmod:CursedTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Shadow Form: Adapt this with a Shadow gene.

evolutionmod:SpiderBite.NAME: Spider Bite
evolutionmod:SpiderBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Insect Form: add a Drone to your hand. NL Lizard form: apply !M! Poison for each Drone in your hand and Exhaust them.

evolutionmod:SirenSong.NAME: Siren Song
evolutionmod:SirenSong.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy intending to attack. NL Exhaust. NL Channel a Merfolk gene.

evolutionmod:BlackCat.NAME: Black Cat
evolutionmod:BlackCat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Beast Form: hits twice. NL Shadow Form: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:NightMare.NAME: Night Mare
evolutionmod:NightMare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Weak equal to the unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust. NL Centaur Form: Channel a Shadow gene.

evolutionmod:Omen.NAME: Omen
evolutionmod:Omen.DESCRIPTION: Fate !M!: if a Curse was discarded apply !M! Weak. NL Lymean Form: Fate an additional card. NL Shadow Form: apply 2 Weak.

evolutionmod:Toxin.NAME: Toxin
evolutionmod:Toxin.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Poison. NL Plant Form: NL Lizard Form: NL apply additional Poison equal to !M! % of the enemy's maximum health and Exhaust.

evolutionmod:ThickHide.NAME: Thick Hide
evolutionmod:ThickHide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated armor. NL Beast Form: NL Centaur Form: gain 1 Plated armor.
evolutionmod:ThickHide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated armor. NL Beast Form: channel a Centaur gene.

evolutionmod:Strenghten.NAME: Strengthen
evolutionmod:Strenghten.DESCRIPTION: Fate 3: gain !M! Vigor for each Attack discarded. NL Exhaust. NL Lymean Form: Fate an additionnal card. NL Centaur Form: gain !M! Vigor.

evolutionmod:PeaceAndTranquility.NAME: Read the Water
evolutionmod:PeaceAndTranquility.DESCRIPTION: Fate 3: gain !B! Block per Attack discarded. NL Lymean Form: Fate an additionnal card. NL Merfolk Form: gain 2 more Block per Attack.
evolutionmod:PeaceAndTranquility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fate 3: gain !B! Block per Attack discarded. NL Lymean Form: Fate an additionnal card. NL Channel a Merfolk gene.

evolutionmod:Firebloom.NAME: Firebloom
evolutionmod:Firebloom.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Lavafolk gene. NL Plant Form: Channel a Lavafolk gene.
evolutionmod:Firebloom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Lavafolk genes. NL Plant Form: Channel a Lavafolk gene.

evolutionmod:FireAnts.NAME: Fire Ants
evolutionmod:FireAnts.DESCRIPTION: Evoke up to !M! Lavafolk genes and add a Drone to your hand for each one. NL Insect Form: Channel a Lavafolk gene.
evolutionmod:FireAnts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke up to !M! Lavafolk genes and add a Drone to your hand for each one. NL Channel an Insect gene and a Lavafolk gene.

evolutionmod:Pheromones.NAME: Pheromones
evolutionmod:Pheromones.DESCRIPTION: Plant Form: Succubus Form: all enemies lose !M! strength this turn.

evolutionmod:SpikeVolley.NAME: Spike Volley
evolutionmod:SpikeVolley.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Plant Form: add damage equal to !M! times your Thorn and Bramble and remove your Bramble.

evolutionmod:Phoenix.NAME: Phoenix
evolutionmod:Phoenix.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Harpy Form: Adapt with your Lavafolk genes.
evolutionmod:Phoenix.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Channel a Lavafolk gene. NL Harpy Form: Adapt with your Lavafolk genes.

evolutionmod:Symbiotes.NAME: Symbiotes
evolutionmod:Symbiotes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Brambles and twice as much Block the first time you play a Drone each turn. NL Insect Form: Plant Form: Refund 1.

evolutionmod:HardWorker.NAME: Hard Worker
evolutionmod:HardWorker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Centaur Form: gain 1 Strength.
evolutionmod:HardWorker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Centaur Form: NL Insect Form: gain 1 Strength.

evolutionmod:CurrentsDancer.NAME: Currents Dancer
evolutionmod:CurrentsDancer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Harpy Form: gain 1 Dexterity.
evolutionmod:CurrentsDancer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Harpy Form: NL Merfolk Form: gain 1 Dexterity.

evolutionmod:ShiftingStrike.NAME: Shifting strike
evolutionmod:ShiftingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your first gene against the enemy. NL Shift your first gene.
evolutionmod:ShiftingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your first !M! genes against the enemy and Shift them.

evolutionmod:ShiftingGuard.NAME: Shifting guard
evolutionmod:ShiftingGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Trigger your first gene against the enemy. NL Shift your first gene.
evolutionmod:ShiftingGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Trigger your first !M! genes against the enemy and Shift them.

evolutionmod:ShiftingPower.NAME: Shifting power
evolutionmod:ShiftingPower.DESCRIPTION: Trigger your first gene against the enemy. NL Shift a number of genes equal to your energy.
evolutionmod:ShiftingPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger your first !M! genes against the enemy. NL Shift a number of genes equal to your energy.

evolutionmod:ChimeraStrike.NAME: Chimera Strike
evolutionmod:ChimeraStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Adapt with your oldest gene.

evolutionmod:ChimeraDefense.NAME: Chimera Defense
evolutionmod:ChimeraDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Target an enemy. NL Adapt with your oldest gene.

evolutionmod:CrystalShard.NAME: Crystal Shard
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Randomized Form: add !M! damage. NL Randomized Form: draw a card. NL Exhaust.
Form: draw a card. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:CrystalStone.NAME: Crystal Stone
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Randomized Form: add !M! Block. NL Randomized Form: refund 1 energy. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:CrystalDust.NAME: Crystal Dust
evolutionmod:CrystalDust.DESCRIPTION: Form: draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust. NL Startup: shuffle a copy of this card in your draw pile.
evolutionmod:CrystalDust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Form: draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust. NL Startup: shuffle !M! copies of this card in your draw pile.

evolutionmod:Treasure.NAME: Treasure
evolutionmod:Treasure.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Crystal Stone, Shard or Dust to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
evolutionmod:Treasure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an upgraded Crystal Shard, Block or Dust to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:Grow.NAME: Grow
evolutionmod:Grow.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. Startup: shuffle a copy of this card in your draw pile
evolutionmod:Grow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. Startup: shuffle !M! copies of this card in your draw pile

evolutionmod:Shrink.NAME: Shrink
evolutionmod:Shrink.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Orb slot. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.
evolutionmod:Shrink.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Lose 1 Orb slot. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.

evolutionmod:Ritual.NAME: Ritual
evolutionmod:Ritual.DESCRIPTION: Permanently Adapt this with your oldest non-adapted gene. NL Exhaust.
evolutionmod:Ritual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Permanently Adapt this with your oldest !M! non-adapted genes. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:GodForm.NAME: GodForm
evolutionmod:GodForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn trigger all your genes.
evolutionmod:GodForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn trigger all your genes !M! times.

evolutionmod:DarkDesires.NAME: Dark Desires
evolutionmod:DarkDesires.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy deal !M! damage to it. Succubus Form: channel a Shadow gene.

evolutionmod:Drone.NAME: Drone
evolutionmod:Drone.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gains Block and damage from Potency instead of Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

evolutionmod:Feather.NAME: Feather
evolutionmod:Feather.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card and discard a card. NL Harpy form: return a Feather Storm from your discard pile to your hand.
evolutionmod:Feather.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and discard !M! cards. NL Harpy form: return a Feather Storm from your discard pile to your hand.

mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.NAME: Closing Barrage
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power and [#FF5252]Poise multiplied by !M!.
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X+1 times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power and [#FF5252]Poise multiplied by !M!.
